test_context.description: VR simulation mimicking physical fitness tests based on standard protocols. Includes a theoretical quiz.

vr_simulation_results.instructor_comments: Impressive balance and strength. Could improve flexibility routines.

quiz_results.remarks: Strong grasp on physiology; missed a couple on stretching techniques.

rag_agent_summary.summary: Arnab demonstrates strong overall fitness with excellent performance in strength and balance tests. Quiz results reflect good theoretical understanding. Slight improvement needed in flexibility training and injury prevention knowledge.
recommendations: Review injury prevention protocols in the provided material.
Retest in 2 weeks to track flexibility gains.
